entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person who is with Harry, shaking his head and saying 'Barking mad'. He is trying to get Harry to leave the tent.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who has just finished a task, feeling elated and picking up his golden egg and Firebolt. He is being congratulated by Ron.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as a person who did a weird thing during the task, Transfiguring a rock into a dog to distract the dragon. He got burned but managed to get away with the egg.

entities.name: dragon
entities.description: The dragon is mentioned as an animal that was part of the task, which Cedric tried to distract by Transfiguring a rock into a dog. It changed its mind and went for Cedric instead.

entities.name: labrador
entities.description: The Labrador is mentioned as an animal that the dragon was initially interested in, but then decided to go for Cedric instead.
